questions.question: After performing a recrystallization, where are the impurities found?

answers.c: On the surface of the pure crystals

explanations.a: Impurities do not evaporate in this process.
explanations.b: Only insoluble particles may remain here.
explanations.c: Usually, pure crystals are formed separately.
explanations.d: Correct. Soluble impurities remain in the filtrate after recrystallization.
